p: Statute for Members of the European Parliament
Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 45 to 48 and 77 thereof.

p: This appropriation is intended to cover the transitional allowance after the end of a Member’s term of office.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 5 000.

p lang: Conference of Speakers of EU Parliaments

p: Geographical area covered: countries outside the European Union with the exception of European Union candidate and potential candidate countries.

This appropriation is intended to cover the expenditure committed for promoting relations between the European Parliament and democratically elected national parliaments from third countries as well as with corresponding regional parliamentary organisations. It relates notably to activities aimed at strengthening the parliamentary capacity in new and emerging democracies
p lang: promoting human rights and encouraging the use of new information and communication technologies by parliaments.
